title: Ohayou to Oyasumi to Sono Ato ni
original_name: おはようとおやすみとそのあとに
sinopse: The story follows Kaito Tachibana, an aspiring chef, who hires Kataoka Isuke on a whim on rainy day in Tokyo. Kataoka moved to Tokyo for university as a digital arts student and works part-time at the restaurant where Tachibana is training as a chef. With time, Tachibana and Kataoka move in together and their work relationship develops into something more.
